casebody.data:
In re Resignation of Wright. Toledo Bar Association v. Wright.

[Cite as In re Resignation of Wright (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 616.]

(Nos. D.R. 88-4 and D.M. 87-1 Decided May 11, 1988.)

The resignation of Douglas W. Wright as an attorney is accepted.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
